newsitem.title: USA: AFTER THE BELL - Cisco down at 65.
newsitem.headline: AFTER THE BELL - Cisco down at 65.

text.p: Cisco Systems Inc was trading at 65 against a close of 67-1/8 on the NASDAQ National Market in after-hours trading after it released second-quarter earnings, traders said Tuesday.
After the market closed, Cisco reported second-quarter earnings per share of $0.49, compared to $0.31 for the same period the year before.
One trader said high-tech stocks had been rebounding near the end of the day, spilling over into after-hours trading. "The market was very strong at the end of the day," he said.
Mercury Finance Co was holding at 2-1/4, while Informix was trading at 21-1/4, up from 20-5/8 at the day's close.
The New York Stock Exchange said session one had a volume of 57,800 shares against Monday's 10,200. Session two had a volume of 14,624,776. There was no session two on the previous day.
